website_summaries.verdict: Handmade olive oil-based soap bars that soften the skin and do not contain animal-derived ingredients.
pros: Smells of olive oil and contains no added fragrances
Bars are cut by hand and sourced from Mediterranean olives
Long-lasting compared to other vegan soaps
Works well for dry and sensitive skin
cons: Not everyone likes the smell of olive oil

customer_reviews.title: REAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm from a mediterranean geography. My grandfather and my father used to make olive oil soap for ourselves. So I know which one is real olive oil soap or which one is not. This soap is what I was looking for. I tried other brands, but they didn't satisfy me. I'm glad for finding this seller. Please keep selling, I don't want to waste my money trying soap out there. P.s. Real olive oil soap doesn't smell like regular market soap. So some people might think "something is wrong with that soap". Believe me, this is a REAL olive oil soap.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They smell is powerful but pleasant, just as described by the seller. There is no lingering fragrance on skin so that is really nice. The bars are a little awkward to hold until they get warn in but this is typical of handmade soaps. My skin feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevynne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very few ingredients yielding many great results!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap and it’s smell! I’ve been using it less than a week and my skin is looking better for it already. After I’m done with this order, I’ll definitely be placing another. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Yost

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for a natural soap
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying different natural soaps and can attest to their overpricy-ness. The other 2.5 oz bars last under a week, so I opted for the larger bar. I'm still on the first bar and entering my 3 week of usage. The soap has no real scent to it and does a decent amount of lather. What really floored me was the pricing. Since it was my first timing buying this brand, i thought it was suspect, but after using it, I can say its the best value imo on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: jimbean9

customer_reviews.title: Nice, neutral soap
customer_reviews.text: Nice soap, neutral scent. The value is great. I will use it to make my dry laundry powder and I prefer an olive oil Castile or similar for a soap to add to it. I had a problem with my order upon arrival and it was taken care of quickly. For the value you get with this package, I was only looking to notify the seller of the issue - I wasn't expecting anything but it was taken care of above and beyond. You don't get that these days. A+
customer_reviews.author: ElCzort

customer_reviews.title: About as good as Kiss My Face
customer_reviews.text: Since the major brand of pure olive oil bars has been discontinued, apparently, this is a reasonable substitute. The cost is much less, the feel is about the same, the smell is about the same or even better. The color is less interesting (off-white instead of green). The bars don't look as nice out of the wrapper but I guess that doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap!
customer_reviews.text: Similar to another reviewer, I was looking for a replacement for the MIA Kiss My Face product. This is really great soap and superior to the KMF soap. It's got a richer lather, cleaner odor and seems to last just as long. And no allergic reaction either.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Natural great find
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the soap is wonderful. Very clean rinse with NO residue, grittiness, or soap scum. Lasting bars, scent is very mild but it IS all natural so that's fine. It's solid and not clumsy to handle while wet. A great buy for natural soap enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: K. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels like I had a facial
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the soap for a nearly a week. I use 1 bar on my face and another to bathe with. Ordinarily I would wash my face once a day but, I like the feel of my skin after using the olive soap that I wash it twice now. My skin feels fresh and a little tight but oh how bright! I apply moisturizer right after to keep the dewy look. I can't wait to see what a month of using this soap on my whole body will look like. I bet I'll be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Small

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this soap a few times before and it always had a pleasant, natural, earthy smell. However, upon opening the box this time, there was an overpowering chemical-like fragrance coming from the box. It smells nothing like olive. It will literally stink up the entire room. The soap has the same consistency but the smell is hard to get over. I may return the rest of the bars. This is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Bafumi

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: makes my skin super soft ,I also gave it to my girl and her skin feels amazing as well.as far as smell there really isn't much of a smell,like it doesn't smell good or bad to me,I can see why some people were weirded out by the smell but to me it was all good
customer_reviews.author: Island of youth betta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent soap
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes simplicity is the best solution. My wife and I both like the light fragrance of this soap. It leaves a very clean feel to my skin. This soap doesn't leave soap scum on our shower the way many others do. It's simply a great value.
customer_reviews.author: James P McComas

customer_reviews.title: Very good bath soap
customer_reviews.text: This olive oil soap is the most mild and gentle I have found. It is easy to use and does not irritate the skin. It has little to no scent, but has enough surfacing cleaning quality to make it very effective. The larger bars are sometimes in limited supply, but work better in the bath when they are available.
customer_reviews.author: BTWMS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. My girl loves it too. Has an acquired scent. However, it's nice to know I am using natural stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo Paizano

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathroom Handsoap
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy these because the seller put cautionary statements about smell, etc. I don't get the fuss, these are great bars of soap. I use them with magnetic soap holders and everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Veter

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really feel the difference in my skin. I am going to let my kids try it as well. I don’t think I am goi g to use commercially produced soap anymore. Thanks for making a good product for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ihsane

customer_reviews.title: Keeps skin from drying out in winter.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a northern region and this soap has helped keep my skin moisturized during the winter. My skin does not get all dry like it used to. The mild scent is refreshing. It cleans you without overwhelming you with "soap smell." This is a great product that I have used for over 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great natural Olive oil soap
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have really enjoyed this product, have purchased it three times already. Great on sensitive skin, no purfumey smell, very mild. Leaves moisturized, no tight skin feeling coming out of the shower, will continue to purchase this all natural soap, recommend it to my mother and she too has since started using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: These are nice soap bars, they last quite long. No scent really that as disappointing
customer_reviews.author: L&A

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleansing
customer_reviews.text: With psoriasis and eczema our family has sensitive skin and we love how gentle this soap is! We have tried other olive oil soaps and do not like them nearly as much as this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap.. it's great for dry skin and acne prone and skin with blackheads. After 2 weeks of use my teens have perfect clear skin no blemishes at all. I also use this on my toddler and no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting soap
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars of natural olive oil soap. This soap gives a sudsy performance - while not being bothered by scents. I wasn't sure I was going to like them, being without fragrance. Now, I just love the way the soap smells naturally clean. This soap is very mild and doesn't leave me with chapped hands like store brand soaps. The bars are large and long lasting - a real value.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a KMF Police oil bar soap user by a year or so and recently discovered this product. It’s maybe not quite the quality of KMF but it makes my skin smile and much more affordable for a retired person on a fixed income.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The soap really helps moisturize the skin. I have sensitive skin, I sometime use it on my face and feels great. Soap has a very light scent though.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Butt

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find a soap I can use.
customer_reviews.text: Coconut and tree nut allergy and soap is hard to find. This is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% Best soap
customer_reviews.text: Best soap I've ever used in my life !!! Your skin just gets better and better the more you use it.........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality soap makes you feel clean but doesn't dry skin
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hogue

customer_reviews.title: NOT for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance is not listed as an ingredient but it has a VERY strong smell that hits you in the face as you open the box. Once you get the soap out of the box the fragrance is much lighter so I decided to give it a shot. Now my skin is irritated in every spot where clothing rubs. Neck, chest, underarms, thighs. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Soap for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and can use only olive soap. This product has worked for me. It’s silky smooth and very therapeutic I recommend using this soap for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: I have been using and loving this soap for several years. When the seller I had used no longer carried it I was beside myself. I found these guys and my fears were calmed. They were fast and I had no problems. I give them 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Roberts

customer_reviews.title: GREATNESS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS SOAP! I LOVE HOW SILKY IT FEELS WHEN IT LATHERS. I WASH MY FACE AND BODY WITH IT AND IT DOES NOT DRY IT OUT. THE SMELL IS NOT THE BEST BUT YOU DONT SMELL IT ON YOUR BODY. I WILL DEFINITELY BE PURCHASING THESE AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was hopeful
customer_reviews.text: The soap isnt cleaning my dishes. I was hopeful going in due to wanting to be zero waste but its terrible. So I'm going back to dawn. I have been using it for over a week so it's not like I haven't tried.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin Horne

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap! There's not much scent to it but it works great. It cleans good and my hands don't get dried out like they do with other soaps. It's probably the best soap I have ever used. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dale DuRee

customer_reviews.title: soap
customer_reviews.text: great soap, took a chance on this product as product used previously was discontinued. Very pleased and actually liking it so much more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an olive oil based soap Tpp and I found this qnatural soap. It has a pleasant mild scent, lathers well. Skin feels soft and clean I would recommendit
customer_reviews.author: Penny R. Tronolone

customer_reviews.title: Best soap we've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? It cleans and moistens beautifully, lasts a long time, it's all natural (consists only of olive oil, vegetable oil. and water) and very gentile on the skin. For us, it's a great find and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Raye Newmen

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I mean this soap is good but not really very moisturizing for someone with real dry skin like me. It’s not really drying nor really moisturizing. I ordered 9 bars which I have to say not very happy about that, well it’s life and I’m gonna use them till I run out of them and can’t wait for that day.😂
customer_reviews.author: Emaan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SOAP!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that this soap does not dry my hands out when I use it. In fact it feels moisturizing to my skin. The scent is very light and subtle which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice with little to no scent. Definitely Vegan, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Down To Earth

customer_reviews.title: Lovely olive oil soap
customer_reviews.text: This is the only soap I use and love that it is vegan, natural and olive oil. Rated high for scent as it doesn't have any except for faint olive oil. Doesn't get mushy - great soap all around.
customer_reviews.author: Tell

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Now my "go to" soap. Can't rave about it enough.
customer_reviews.author: a. s. draper

customer_reviews.title: if it latherrs and cleans
customer_reviews.text: like it very much, it does lather and clean quite well.will buy again-price is also good as olive oil is usually pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Spahr

customer_reviews.text: This soap is the best! It has done amazing things for my skin. I'm actually getting complements on it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

product_meta.title: Olive Oil Soap Bar - Handmade 100% Pure Natural & Vegan - 5.7 oz Each Bar (9 Bars)
feature_bullets: 30 days Satisfaction Guarantee - We realize that some of us may find genuine smell of olive oil is foreign to them. Our products are 100% natural and handmade. We do not use any additional scent in olive oil soap bars, therefore you may find genuine smell of olive oil foreign to you. Please contact with us if you have any problem with your purchase. 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – Please send us an email if you have any problem with your purchase.

Olives from the Mediterranean to your home handmade by artisans using traditional techniques and 100% raw organic materials for best cleansing and health care. None of the soap bars went through automation processes or chemical treatment. Please excuse even small imperfections in each bar's cuts they were all done by hand.
INGREDIENTS: Olive Oil, Soap Base, Vegatable Oil, Water. Nothing else. This product is manufactured with 100% natural ingredients.
Therapy for body. Safely use it in the bathroom, kitchen, baby tub, spa, or give the gift of nature to the loved ones
Not animal tested, handmade, free of parabens, alcohol, sulfate or any other checmicals. Naturally Anatolian from Turkey
